column1: Cat Deeley returns to host a historic 10th season of the Emmy-nominated dance competition that scours the nation for talent. At auditions across the country, resident judges Nigel Lythgoe and Mary Murphy are joined by special guest judges, including celebrities and former contestants, as they meet new dancers. Once contestants are selected, they tackle a variety of dance styles each week during breathtaking performances. As suspenseful eliminations whittle down the contenders, America's favorite dancers are revealed.
